name: POST body containing valid authorization information and correct data (title, category_id, description, content) is sent to the /api/addBlog endpoint, it must be verified that the returned status code is 200, the remark information in the response body is "success",
fullName: As an administrator, I want to be able to create a new blog post via API connection.: POST body containing valid authorization information and correct data (title, category_id, description, content) is sent to the /api/addBlog endpoint, it must be verified that the returned status code is 200, the remark information in the response body is "success",
description: and the message information is "Successfully Added."

steps.name: *  Rekare The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token.
*  Rekare The api user sets "api/addBlog" path parameters.
*  Rekare The api user prepares a POST request to send to the API addBlog endpoint.
*  Rekare The api user sends a "POST" request and saves the returned response.
*  Rekare The api user verifies that the status code is 200.
